original_text: “This is the same Moses they had rejected with the words, ‘Who made you ruler and judge?’ He was sent to be their ruler and deliverer by God himself, through the angel who appeared to him in the bush.
korean_text: 그들의 말이 누가 너를 관리와 재판장으로 세웠느냐 하며 거절하던 그 모세를 하나님은 가시나무 떨기 가운데서 보이던 천사의 손으로 관리와 속량하는 자로서 보내셨으니

sentences.original_text: they had rejected with the words
He was sent to be their ruler and deliverer
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들의 통치자와 구원자로 보내심을 받았습니다

sentences.original_text: who appeared to him in the bush
sentences.korean_translation: 떨기나무 속에서 그에게 나타난 천사를 통해
